original_title: 女教師NTR 学年主任の妻が教頭先生と修学旅行の下見へ行ったきり… 水川スミレ
overview: Sumire is a married female teacher who began quarreling with her husband, at the worst possible timing, just as she was about to share a room with the vice-principal teacher for a school trip.
title: Female Teacher NTR Cheating Scenario. Wife Is the Head Teacher at School and Takes a Trip with the Vice Principal to Scout Field Trip Locations
